Freq: 6709
幞，古代汉族男子用的一种头巾。也称幞头。古人以皂绢三尺裹发，有四带，二带系脑后垂之，二带反系头上，令曲折附项，故称“幞头。
Yao, a headscarf used by ancient Han men. Also called 幞tou. The ancients used soap and silk to wrap their hair in three feet, with four bands, the second band was tied to the back of the head, and the second band was tied to the head, making twists and turns attached, so it was called "Liaotou."

幞字的基本解释

幞
fú
〔幞头〕古代男子用的一种头巾。
同“袱”。

幞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》房玉切，入燭，奉。］
亦作“纀2”。
(1)巾帕，布袱。
(2)头巾。参见“幞頭”。

幞字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幞； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页336第20
【唐韻】房玉切【集韻】【韻會】逢玉切，?音襆。【說文】帊也。【集韻】帕也。【玉篇】巾幞。【廣韻】幞頭，周武帝所製。裁幅巾，出四脚以幞頭，乃名焉。【唐書·車服志】幞頭起於後周，便武事者也。【二儀實錄】古以皂羅三尺裹頭，號頭巾，三代皆冠。列品黔首，以皁絹裹發。至周武帝，依古三尺裁爲幞頭，唐馬周交解爲之。【朱子·語類】唐人幞頭，初止以紗爲之。後以紗軟，砍木作一山子，在前襯起。【筆談】梁高祖始布漆於紗，施鐵爲脚。【宋史·輿服志】幞頭，一名折上巾，起自後周，然止以軟帛垂脚。隋始以桐木爲之，唐始以羅代繒，惟帝服則脚上曲，人臣下垂，五代漸變平直。國朝之制，君臣通服平脚，乗輿或服上焉。其初以藤織草巾子爲裏，紗爲表，而塗以漆，後惟以漆爲堅，去其藤裏，前爲一折，平施兩脚，以鐵爲之。　又【集韻】博木切，音卜。裳削幅謂之幞。或作襆。

幞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

幞字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　幞; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 336 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Fang Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Every jade cut,? The sound is shady. [Said the text] also. [Ji Yun] Pa Ye. 【Jade articles】women. 【Guangyun】Liaotou, made by Emperor Wu of Zhou. The cut scarf, with four legs and a head, is the name Yan. 【Tang Shu·Car Service History】The first time starts in the next week, and it is also suitable for military affairs. [Records of the Eryi] The ancient Zaolao wrapped the head with three feet, and the turban was crowned for all three generations. List Qianshou, wrapped in soap and silk. To Emperor Wu of the Zhou Dynasty, it was cut into a scorpion head according to the ancient three feet, and the Tang, Ma, and Zhou crosses interpreted it as it. 【Zhuzi·genre】Tang people’s head, the beginning of which was made of yarn. The yarn was softened at the back, and wood was cut to make a mountain, which was lined up in the front. [British Talk] Liang Gaozu started to lacquer the cloth with iron as his feet. [Song History·Yufuzhi] The head of the scorpion, one folds a scarf, starting from the next week, and then hanging down with soft silk. At the beginning of the Sui Dynasty, Tongmu was used for it, and at the beginning of the Tang Dynasty, it was used for Luodai. In the system of the state and dynasty, the emperor and the ministers should pass on flat feet, and the court or the upper yan. At the beginning, the rattan weaving grass towel was used as the inner and the yarn was used as the surface, and the paint was painted, and then the lacquer was used as the firmness. When the rattan was removed, the front was folded, the two feet were flat, and the iron was used for it.　 [Jiyun] Bo Muqie, sound divination. The cut width of the clothes is called the 幞. Or as shameless.
